landing.title: AI-Powered Crop
landing.subtitle: Disease Detection
landing.description: Protect your crops with cutting-edge artificial intelligence. Upload aphoto and get instant disease detection with confidence scores and treatment recommendations.
landing.whyDesc: Our advanced AI technology provides farmers with the tools they need to protect their crops and maximize yields.

features.title: AI-Powered Detection
features.desc: Advanced machine learning algorithms analyze your crop images for instant disease identification.

features.title: Instant Results
features.desc: Get detection results in seconds with confidence scores and detailed analysis.

features.title: Early Prevention
features.desc: Catch disease early to prevent crop loss and optimize your harvest yield.

landing.howDesc: Simple, fast, and accurate crop disease detection in three easy steps

steps.title: Upload Image
steps.desc: Take a photo of your crop or upload an existing image from your device.

steps.title: AI Analysis
steps.desc: Our AI analyzes the image and identifies the crop type and any potential diseases.

steps.title: Get Results
steps.desc: Receive instant results with confidence scores and save to your history for tracking.

landing.ctaDesc: Join thousands of farmers who trust CropWise to keep their crops healthy and maximize their harvest yields.
